original: @299b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @299b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aaksha su tra laksha na /
analyzed: aaksha su tra laksha na /
translated: Akṣasūtralakṣaṇa

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The Characteristics of the Recitation Rosary

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la lha mo sangs rgyas spyan mas zhus pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la lha mo sangs rgyas spyan mas zhus pa /
translated: The goddess Buddhalocanā asked Vajrasattva:

original: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i don ci lags //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i don ci lags //
translated: What is the meaning of the recitation rosary?

original: mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsung du gsol /
analyzed: mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsung du gsol /
translated: Please speak, O Supreme Lord!

original: rdo rje sems dpal gsungs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpal gsungs pa /
translated: Vajrasattva said:

original: lha mo nyon cig rab tu bshad do //🔽khyod kyis zhus pa de brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: lha mo nyon cig rab tu bshad do // khyod kyis zhus pa de brjod par bya'o //
translated: Goddess, listen and I will explain well.🔽I will speak of what you have asked.

original: de thams cad kyi gtam bshad do //
analyzed: de thams cad kyi gtam bshad do //
translated: I will explain all that is to be said.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du'o //
translated: It is for the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: mi spang ba'i sems kyi sdom pa de bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes mi spang ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bzlas pa'i phreng ba 'di'o //
analyzed: mi spang ba'i sems kyi sdom pa de bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes mi spang ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bzlas pa'i phreng ba 'di'o //
translated: Just as the vow of the mind that does not abandon is the recitation rosary of the yogi who has attained the non-abandonment of merit and wisdom.

original: gang la bzlas pa'i phreng ba la dad pa mos pa gus pas gzung ngo //
analyzed: gang la bzlas pa'i phreng ba la dad pa mos pa gus pas gzung ngo //
translated: One should hold with faith, devotion, and respect the rosary on which the recitation is done.

original: sdig pa thams cad spong ngo //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad spong ngo //
translated: One should abandon all evil.

original: sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: One will be free from all suffering.

original: / gang du bzung na mgrin pa dang lag pa'i rtsa bar ro //
analyzed: / gang du bzung na mgrin pa dang lag pa'i rtsa bar ro //
translated: If one holds it at the throat or the base of the arm,

original: des ni bya ba thams cad 'grub par nges so //
analyzed: des ni bya ba thams cad 'grub par nges so //
translated: one will certainly accomplish all activities.

original: bzlas pa byas pas lha mo dang dpa' bo nges par grub ba rab tu ster ro //
analyzed: bzlas pa byas pas lha mo dang dpa' bo nges par grub ba rab tu ster ro //
translated: By doing the recitation, one will certainly obtain the accomplishment of the goddess and hero.

original: rnal 'byor mchog gis thob pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog gis thob pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'byung ngo //
translated: One will attain the state of Vajrasattva, equal to the supreme yoga.

original: byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis sdig pa @300a * //
analyzed: byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis sdig pa @300a * //
translated: Even if one has committed many sins,

original: mang po byas pa dang / thams cad spangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang po byas pa dang / thams cad spangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will become free from all of them.

original: rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin pas /
analyzed: rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin pas /
translated: If one holds the thread of the recitation of the one-footed [Vajrayoginī],

original: bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will remember one's divine birth.

original: phyed kyi tshad kyis bzlas na des lha dang lha mo'i bde ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyed kyi tshad kyis bzlas na des lha dang lha mo'i bde ba mthong ngo //
translated: If one recites half the amount, one will see the bliss of gods and goddesses.

original: mang ba yis bzlas na brdzun pa'i ngag spangs pa'o ;
analyzed: mang ba yis bzlas na brdzun pa'i ngag spangs pa'o ;
translated: If one recites more, one will abandon false speech.

original: / dung gi la bzlas pa'i yon tan gcig 'byung ngo //
analyzed: / dung gi la bzlas pa'i yon tan gcig 'byung ngo //
translated: One will obtain the quality of the conch recitation.

original: lung tang la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung ngo //
analyzed: lung tang la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung ngo //
translated: By reciting over a lump of clay, two qualities will arise.

original: lcags la bzlas pas yon tan gsum 'byung ngo //
analyzed: lcags la bzlas pas yon tan gsum 'byung ngo //
translated: By reciting over iron, three qualities will arise.

original: de la la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o //
analyzed: de la la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o //
translated: By reciting over a stone, four qualities will arise.

original: nor bu mu tig byi ru la bzlas pas yon tan bcu dran no //
analyzed: nor bu mu tig byi ru la bzlas pas yon tan bcu dran no //
translated: By reciting over a jewel, pearl, or coral, ten qualities will be remembered.

original: dbang po'i dmigs la bzlas pas yon tan bcu 'byung ngo //🔽padma la bzlas pas yon tan bye ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i dmigs la bzlas pas yon tan bcu 'byung ngo // padma la bzlas pas yon tan bye ba'o //
translated: By reciting over a sense object, ten qualities will arise.🔽By reciting over a lotus, one hundred thousand qualities.

original: yon tan bye ba ru dr'aksha la'o //
analyzed: yon tan bye ba ru dr'aksha la'o //
translated: By reciting over a rudraksha, one hundred thousand qualities.

original: bo de tsi la bzlas pas bcu drug dang 'dra bar dus 'das pa yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bo de tsi la bzlas pas bcu drug dang 'dra bar dus 'das pa yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo //
translated: By reciting over a bodhicitta, sixteen times, immeasurable qualities will arise.

original: bzlas pa phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o //
translated: These qualities of the rosary recitation were spoken by Vajrasattva.

original: mkhas pas lhag pa dang chad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mkhas pas lhag pa dang chad par mi bya'o //
translated: The wise one should not make it too long or too short.

original: lhag pa chad pa la bgegs chen po 'jug go //
analyzed: lhag pa chad pa la bgegs chen po 'jug go //
translated: If it is too long or too short, a great obstacle will enter.

original: des na mnyam par bya'o //
analyzed: des na mnyam par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be made equal.

original: bzlas pa'i dus song nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i dus song nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: When the recitation is finished, one should perform one hundred and eight fire offerings.

original: sdigs mdzub snying gar byas te mdzub mos bzlas na bgegs bkug nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub snying gar byas te mdzub mos bzlas na bgegs bkug nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites with the index finger at the heart, having summoned the obstructors, one will destroy them.

original: gung mos bgrangs pas the tshom med par dngos grub 'byung ngo //🔽srin lag gis bgrangs pas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub 'grub bo //
analyzed: gung mos bgrangs pas the tshom med par dngos grub 'byung ngo // srin lag gis bgrangs pas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub 'grub bo //
translated: If one counts with the middle finger, one will obtain powers without doubt.🔽If one counts with the ring finger, one will accomplish the powers of the yakṣas.

original: mthe chung gis bgrangs pas sha za dgug pa dang bskrad pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: mthe chung gis bgrangs pas sha za dgug pa dang bskrad pa 'grub bo //
translated: If one counts with the little finger, one will accomplish summoning and expelling the piśācas.

original: mdo 'dzin la bskor zhing bya'o //
analyzed: mdo 'dzin la bskor zhing bya'o //
translated: One should do this while turning the rosary.

original: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so /
analyzed: bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so /
translated: The characteristics of the rosary for recitation are complete.

original: // / pandi ta sa ra he ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta sa ra he ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the paṇḍita Saraha and the translator Gelong Sherab Gyaltsen.
